name: Oh, I Thought You Said Giant Bomb Was 10-year-olds
name_original: Oh, I Thought You Said Giant Bomb Was 10-year-olds
description:
Oh, I thought you said Giant Bomb was 10-year-olds...
I made a game where you throw water balloons at 10-year-old versions of the Giant Bomb crew. The 9 day game jam was more like a 2 day game jam for me with a busy week, so I didn't get as much done as I would have liked but would still love for people to try it out and am excited to try out all the other games! Available on Windows and Android

Controls:
Click (or tap!) and hold to charge power, release to throw water balloon. Hit 20 duders to get to level 2! (there's only two levels) 
Escape to quit

The game speeds up as you go, so get those hits in while you can!

Try hitting the swings on the first level and the bell and windows on the second level.

Featuring all your favorites like Lockdown and the Grilled Cheese font!

Made by John Scovic in Unity
hit up my twitter @cool_guy_stuff
